sentence: Home improvement warehouse operator The Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) saw its price target and earnings estimates boosted on Friday by analysts at Goldman Sachs.
The firm said it now expects HD shares, which had closed at $35.72 on Thursday, to reach $38.
Goldman also raised its earnings estimates, citing stronger home sales and higher lumber pricing, and maintained its "Buy" rating on the stock.
We have been recommending shares of HD since July 30, when the stock was trading at $25.39.
The company has a 2.63% dividend yield, based on last night's closing stock price of $35.72.
The Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) is not recommended at this time, holding a Dividend.com DARSâ„¢ Rating of 3.5 out of 5 stars.
